metadata.title: CVE-2024-45019 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5e: Take state lock during tx timeout reportermlx5e_safe_reopen_channels() requires the state lock taken. Thereferenced changed in the Fixes tag removed the lock to fix anotherissue. This patch adds it back but at a later point (when callingmlx5e_safe_reopen_channels()) to avoid the deadlock referenced in theFixes tag.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
